activities: ComPsych is a leading provider of employee assistance programs and behavioral health, work-life, wellness and HR administration services (collectively “Services”).  From the EEA and Switzerland, we may receive personal data of any type in the course of offering or providing our Services and otherwise conducting our business activities.  ComPsych may receive contact information, health information, inquiry-related information, employment information, information provided through our website, and other information in the course of conducting its business operations; any of this information may include personal data about those persons who utilize our services.  We use this information in order to provide our services, pay our providers, process claims for reimbursement, respond to inquiries from data subjects, or in furtherance of our legitimate business interests.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line; Off-line; Manually Processed, Client and Customer Data
